title: Viral Wallpapers.
content:
ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to Viral Wallpapers!

Our website is dedicated to providing you with a unique and edgy collection of wallpapers that are sure to make your desktop stand out. Our main wallpaper features an abstract pattern inspired by computer viruses and malware, set against a sleek black background.

But that's not all! We have a wide variety of other wallpapers that cater to different tastes and styles. Whether you're into minimalism, nature, or pop culture, we've got you covered.

All of our wallpapers are high-quality and available for free download. So go ahead and browse through our collection, find the perfect wallpaper for you, and give your desktop the makeover it deserves.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of abstract shapes inspired by computer viruses and malware, set against a black background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
